parameters.query: SELECT co.id as company_id, co.name as salon_name, co.whatsapp_number, COUNT(a.id) as total_appointments, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.status = 'onaylandÄ±' THEN 1 END) as confirmed_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.status = 'iptal' THEN 1 END) as cancelled_count, COALESCE(SUM(cs.price), 0) as estimated_revenue FROM companies co LEFT JOIN appointments a ON a.company_id = co.id AND a.date = CURRENT_DATE LEFT JOIN company_services cs ON cs.id = a.service_id WHERE co.service_active = true GROUP BY co.id, co.name, co.whatsapp_number
